attributes.action: bring UK V.A.T. inline with that of our neighbours in Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we pay more V.A.T. in the UK than that of our European neighbours, for example the price of fuel, tobacco and alcohol is much higher in the UK?  Transport, education etc in Europe are of the same or better standard than that in the UK so why are we paying higher taxes for?  Bring out taxation system inline with that of the rest of Europe.
